code: import axios from"axios";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";export default function useGetTestimonials(initial){const[testimonials,setTestimonials]=useState(initial);useEffect(()=>{const fetchTestimonials=async()=>{const res=await axios({method:"get",url:"http://localhost:5000/api/testimonials"});if(res.data.success===true){setTestimonials(res.data.Testimonials);console.log(res.data.Testimonials);}else{alert("Could not get Testimonials");}};fetchTestimonials();},[]);return[testimonials,setTestimonials];}
